page.title: 13LUDFORD PRIMARY SCHOOL Cont:
page.content: At September, 1985 43 children on roll _12 Infants (5_7 yrs) & 31 Juniors (8_11 yrs).Pupils placed in upper and lower classes and enter school in term when they become 5. Staffing _ Head_ master & Assistant and one part time teacher, supported by part_timers _ Sesretary, Cleaner and 2 Mid_day Meal Supervisors. Free lunches available for pupils in low income families. Pupils transfer at 11 to Secondary School, mostly to De Aston, Mkt.Rasen. School bus brings children from Great Tows, Wykeham, Girsby & Burgh on Bain. Open air heated training swimming pool provided by voluntary effort and the village hall & playing field are used. School contributes greatly to village social life with Annual Fete, concerts Whist Drives, Bingo and is the meeting place of the Womens' Institute.
